steps.step: Mix Sugar, Corn Syrup, Water in a saucepan over medium heat, stirring frequently until Sugar dissolves. Bring to a boil without stirring
When syrup reaches 260F, add Food Coloring. Do not stir. Remove from heat at 300F. Add Flavoring and stir
Pour syrup onto a greased cookie sheet. Use a knife to cut into rough squares. Let candy cool
Break candy into pieces and dust with powdered sugar
